results.title: Amniotic membrane hydrogel as novel injectable platform in combination with metformin for treatment of sciatic nerve injury.

results.title: Sex Differences in Neuropathy: The Paradigmatic Case of MetFormin
results.text_hl: We investigated sexual dimorphism in signaling pathways involved by 7 days of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ administration, such as changes in AMP-activated protein kinase and the positive regulation of autophagy machinery, discovering that @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ affected in a sexually dimorphic manner the immunological and @DISEASE_Inflammation @DISEASE_MESH:D007249 @@@inflammatory@@@ response to @<m>DISEASE_Sciatic_Neuropathy</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D020426 @@@nerve lesion@@@.

citations.NLM: De Angelis F, Vacca V, Tofanicchio J, Strimpakos G, Giacovazzo G, Pavone F, Coccurello R, Marinelli S. Sex Differences in Neuropathy: The Paradigmatic Case of MetFormin Int J Mol Sci. 2022 Nov 22;23(23):. PMID: 36498830

results.title: Metformin Enhances Functional Recovery of Peripheral Nerve in Rats with Sciatic Nerve Crush Injury
results.text_hl: ...@<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@ induces autophagy in @<m>DISEASE_Sciatic_Neuropathy</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D020426 @@@sciatic nerve@@@ following @DISEASE_Peripheral_Nerve_Injuries @DISEASE_MESH:D059348 @@@peripheral nerve injury@@@.

results.title: Beneficial Effect of Metformin on Nerve Regeneration and Functional Recovery After Sciatic Nerve Crush Injury in Diabetic Rats.
results.text_hl: The functional recovery was evaluated by electrophysiological studies and behavioral analysis. It was found that @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ significantly enhanced axonal regeneration and functional recovery compared to saline after @<m>DISEASE_Sciatic_Neuropathy</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D020426 @@@sciatic nerve injury@@@ in @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus @DISEASE_MESH:D003920 @@@diabetic@@@ @SPECIES_10116 @@@rats@@@.
